root.name: Beaterator
root.description: It is not a game per se, but rather a utility. This is a fully fledged music maker for your PSP. It comes with many pre-installed beats and sounds that you can add to make your music better. Other pieces of music will be available for download, akin to Rock Band Unplugged. The game is a more fully featured version of an Adobe Flash game that was on the Rockstar Games website in the mid 2000s.Timbaland has recently revealed that he used the program to produce certain songs on his upcoming Shock Value II CD as well as on some tracks for Jay Z's Blueprint 3.
